question: Which of the following Chola King united the Vengi kingdom with the Chola empire in the last quarter of the 12th century?
explanation: Kulottunga Chola I united the two kingdoms of the Eastern Chalukyas of Vengi and the Cholas of Thanjavur in the last quarter of the 12th century. His other name was Rajendra II, who given the title of Sangam Tavirtta (he who abolished tolls).
